function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased demand for space in houses to accommodate work from home could lead to overcrowding and increased risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Higher risk of contagious disease spread within crowded residential areas.","Mitigation":"Emphasize the importance of ventilation, sanitation, and social distancing in residential design and planning.","Technologies":"Smart home technology for air quality monitoring, touchless fixtures, and remote work software.","People":"Residents, urban planners, architects, and developers.","Owner":"Urban planning authorities, architects, developers, and facility management companies."},{"Description":"Decrease in sales of residential units and shift towards gated communities may lead to overpopulation in certain areas, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Higher risk of contagious disease spread in densely populated gated communities and residential areas.","Mitigation":"Implement strict community health guidelines, promote green spaces and outdoor amenities, and prioritize health-focused building design.","Technologies":"Smart building management systems, health monitoring sensors, and outdoor recreational facilities.","People":"Residents, community associations, developers, and urban planners.","Owner":"Community associations, developers, and urban planning authorities."},{"Description":"Disruptions in the supply chain for construction materials could lead to delays in project completion and impact the health and safety of workers due to prolonged exposure to construction sites.","Impact":"Increased risk of worker health and safety hazards, as well as potential delays in building projects.","Mitigation":"Diversify suppliers, prioritize local sourcing, and implement safety protocols to protect workers from disease transmission.","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, project management tools, and safety monitoring systems.","People":"Construction workers, project managers, suppliers, and contractors.","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers, and suppliers."}]}
